video_prompt: Chinese cavalrymen, in an endless formation, march deliberately toward a prominent building. Their armored forms, red robes, and plumed helmets move with a determined posture on richly adorned horses. Soft, diffused lighting shifts, casting gentle shadows across the scene as the cavalry advances. Movement conveys immense depth and scale.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A vast formation of intricately armored Chinese cavalrymen, clad in dark metal with gold patterns and deep red robes, extends towards a prominent Chinese building in the distance. Five detailed cavalry soldiers on earthy brown horses with golden accents dominate the foreground. Soft, diffused sunlight illuminates the scene under a muted gray and white sky. The composition features deep focus on the foreground blending into a blurred background, creating immense depth and scale. Emphasize historical grandeur and intricate detailing.
refined_video_prompt: Cavalrymen advance in an unceasing, deep formation, their determined posture signaling unwavering intent. Armored forms subtly shift, red robes billow, and plumed helmets sway with the horses' deliberate stride. The continuous, forward progression of the vast cavalry conveys immense depth and scale. Lighting gradually shifts, casting dynamic shadows that lengthen and shorten across the ground as the relentless movement brings the formation ever closer to the distant building, revealing its details progressively.
